title: 【临时工搬运】冒险地图-Skyrim Inspired Adventure Map
author: 筒子
txt_content:
本帖最后由 __Tong__ 于 2015-4-15 17:58 编辑 

Razul - Skyrim Inspired Adventure Map冒险地图
[paper]作者原话[paper]RAZUL - ADVENTURE MAP BY BLOCK_FORTRESS
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Please watch the video attached for the overview and trailer

So this is what I have been working on for the past 6 months. It is a fully functioning adventure map basing its core quest design like those within Skyrim. It contains 4 unique areas to explore and a bunch of main quests as well as some side quests. 

This has been a labour of love on my behalf trying to get this thing up and running for you guys. I would really appreciate it if you thought the map was good or just the design to give it a diamond or favourite. Also helping me out by liking the YouTube video would be awesome as well. 

INSTALLATION
-------------------------------
1) Drag and drop the 'Razul - Adventure map by Block_Fortress' into
your saves folder.

If you don't know how to locate your saves folder follow these
tutorials for installation:

MAC: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JM6IpBiZmQA
WINDOWS: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AeGxhq5x-E4

2) Drag and drop the 2 texturepack .ZIP files into your texturepack folder.
This can be done by simply clicking 'texture pack' from the main menu of minecraft then
clicking 'Open texture pack folder' and simply draging and dropping the files
in.

3) INSTALL OPTIFINE (This mod will increase your FPS as well as allowing you
to edit features needed for the custom fog to be more vivid)

OPTIFINE DOWNLOAD: http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... a-af-and-much-more/

4) OPTIFINE SETTINGS

MAIN MENU OF VIDEO SETTINGS:
-Brightness = Moody
-Fog = fast/fancy
-Fog Start = 0.2

QUALITY:
-Mipmap Level: Max
-Mipmap Type: Linear
-Better Grass: Fancy/fast
-Connected Textures: on
-Antialiasing (If you are using ultra): 4-16 (optional)

DETAILS:
-Clouds = Off

LETS PLAY (Read this if you are thinking of doing one)
--------------------------------
If you are going to do a lets play of this map, no matter how small your channel is, you 
are free to use a small collection of shots and images for intros or thumbnails in the 
mediafire link provided below. All I ask is that if you do do a playthrough of this map 
that you link somewere on the video back to the original trailer and/or favourite the
trailer and/or put the link to the original video in the description of your playthrough 
(The viewers can go to this link to find out more about the map and find the download 
links).

Mediafire link to images (1920 x 1080): http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ijcbg87ccttlyfo
Mediafire link to video shots (1080p): http://www.mediafire.com/?gyrqzx8xmirwgu8

Trailer link: (Link will be given in skype when it is released)
Planetminecraft link: " " " 

MULTIPLAYER (Read this if you are wanting to play this map with your friends)
-------------------------------

INSTALLATION

1) Install craft bukkit (for minecraft 1.4.5)

2) Remove all other worlds from the server files

3) Make sure world_nether and world_end have been deleted/remove

4) Drag and drop the 'Razul - Adventure map by BlockFortress' into the server world file and rename it 'world'.

Looking to host this map to play with with your friends? My sponsors can provide you with
a server for a very low cost making playing with your friends a breeze. 

Hosting: http://www.gizmoservers.com/

Also I would just like to thank them for providing me with a server that I could work on.
I wouldn't have been able to do this map without them. 

CREDITS
------------------------------
Texturepack Designer:
- SerAaron: http://www.youtube.com/user/TalesofAmber

Redstone assistance and testing:
- _Toby_ :http://www.youtube.com/user/FancynFar
- Trazlander:http://www.youtube.com/user/TrazLander
- SerAaron

Dungeon layout assistance and testing:
- _Toby_
- SerAaron

Mob spawner help:
- Trazlander
为了尊重作者，我还是不机翻了，这么多英文我的头都要爆炸了下面是本人自己的评价以及搬运的原因
[diamond_gem]搬运理由[diamond_gem]这是一张比较老的地图了，里面的建筑非常多，光截图给的就有三个场景整个地图不光外饰，内饰也做得很不错
[painting]图片欣赏[painting]



[board]作者信息[board]*点击图片跳转作者个人详细介绍*

更多搬运建筑请到：【临时工搬运】索引贴去寻找
